title: Obsession
description: Miranda Branford finds herself in the control of a man who is hell bent on keeping her for his own sick pleasures. Held against her will, Miranda finds that the more he hurts her the more her body craves his touch.Alec DeAngelo, finds himself giving into urges that he had held at bay for way too long. Meeting the wide eyed beauty awakens the beast within him that wants to come out and play.WARNING: This is an adults only book, it contains material of forced sex and submission, violence and abuse. If this material offends please refrain from reading.
author: Elizabeth Ayoub
